org.webdice.ajax
Class AjaxDice

java.lang.Object
  org.webdice.ajax.AjaxDice

public class AjaxDice
extends java.lang.Object

The AjaxDice class is an implementation to the web front talk to logic layer. This class is declared on dwr.xml.

Since:
06/14/2010
Author:
Paulo Ortolan

Constructor Detail

AjaxDice

public AjaxDice()
The main constructor of the AjaxDice class.

Method Detail

roll

public DiceResult roll(int faces)
This method executes a single dice roll by the number of faces. It will return 0 if the number of faces is different than 4, 6, 8, 10, 12 and 20.

Parameters:
faces - The dice number of faces.
Returns:
A single roll result.

rollMultipleTimes

public DiceResult rollMultipleTimes(int faces,
                                    int times)
This method executes a times dice roll by the number of faces. It will return 0 if the number of faces is different than 4, 6, 8, 10, 12 and 20.

Parameters:
faces - The dice number of faces.
times - How many times the dice will roll.
Returns:
The sum of every dice result rolled a number of times.

rollDiceCup

public DiceResult rollDiceCup(int[] faces)
This method executes a single roll for every dice in the dice cup. If some dice face is equals to 0 then 0 will be added to the sum taking no effect.

Parameters:
faces - An array containing valid dice faces.
Returns:
The sum of all single roll result for every dice in the dice cup.

rollDiceCupMultipleTimes

public DiceResult rollDiceCupMultipleTimes(int[] faces,
                                           int times)
This method executes a multiple roll for every dice in the dice cup. If some dice face is equals to 0 then 0 will be added to the sum taking no effect.

Parameters:
faces - An array containing valid dice faces.
times - How many times each dice will roll.
Returns:
The sum of all multiple roll result for every dice in the dice cup.
